creator: OneStudioTeam
descriptionHtml:
Have fun and be relax anytime, anywhere with Color Now.

Color Now is a coloring puzzle game for adults with painting by numbers. There are more than 10,000+ fascinating coloring pages in this coloring book. It is so relax to finish an artwork and bring pictures to life by coloring by numbers.

We are working hard to bring you happy coloring experience. Just enjoy coloring by number.

descriptionShort: Have fun and be relax anytime, anywhere. Just tap and color by number.
title: Color Now - color by number

creator: OneStudioTeam
descriptionHtml:
Color Now is your ultimate escape to a world of magic and colors! By painting by numbers, you'll feel the anxiety melting away, and the satisfaction building up.

Coloring games have become increasingly popular as a way to relieve stress and promote relaxation. Color Now offers a fun and creative outlet for people of all ages to unwind and express themselves. Through this free coloring book, you can find a enjoyable way to take a break from the pressures of daily life. In fact, studies have shown that coloring games can be an effective way to reduce stress, anxiety, and depression, making them a valuable tool for anyone looking to improve their mental health and wellbeing. All you need is five minutes of coloring with Color Now per day to unwind and recharge your batteries. Get ready to feel refreshed and motivated!

Categories of our pictures:

- Characters:
The Characters category includes images of individuals and groups engaged in various activities, such as sports, music, cooking, working, and some of them are even from fairy tales! Coloring people can be a great way to explore different cultures and traditions, as well as to develop an understanding of different professions and lifestyles.

- Houses and Buildings:
The Houses and Buildings category includes a variety of architectural styles, from cozy cottages to towering skyscrapers. Coloring pictures of houses and buildings can be a fun way to learn about different architectural styles and to explore different parts of the world.

- Mandalas:
The Mandalas have a symmetrical pattern and can be colored in various ways to create stunning works of art. Coloring mandalas has been shown to have a calming effect on the mind and can help to promote mindfulness and relaxation.

- Animals:
The Animals category includes a variety of creatures, from domestic pets to wild animals. Coloring animal pictures can be a fun way to learn about different species and their habitats, as well as their unique physical characteristics. This category can include animals that are cute and cuddly, as well as those that are more exotic and interesting.

- Plants and Flowers:
The Plants and Flowers category includes a variety of botanical images, from delicate flowers to lush foliage. Coloring plants and flowers can be a great way to explore different species and to learn about their unique characteristics and properties. This category can also include images of fruits and vegetables, as well as different landscapes and gardens.

With thousands of unique and stunning pictures to choose from, Color Now is the ideal companion for those seeking fun, relaxation, and inspiration. And once you've finished coloring, don't be afraid to share your masterpiece with your friends and family on social media platforms such as Facebook, or other apps, show your art talent to your family and friends!

Start coloring today and unleash your inner artist, letting the creativity flow in this coloring game!
